{{cpp/chrono/weekday_last/title|ok}}
{{cpp/chrono/weekday_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ok() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}
Checks if the weekday object stored in {{c|*this}} is valid.

===Return value===
{{c|weekday().ok()}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    auto wdl{std::chrono::Tuesday[std::chrono::last]};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (wdl.ok()) &lt;&lt; ' ';

    wdl = {std::chrono::weekday(42)[std::chrono::last]};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (wdl.ok()) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true false
}}
